cards.name: Akroma, Angel of Fury
cards.text:
Akroma, Angel of Fury can't be countered.
Flying, trample, protection from white and from blue
{R}: Akroma, Angel of Fury gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Morph {3}{R}{R}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

cards.flavor: "Many must die for the one who should not have perished."
cards.name: Akroma's Vengeance
cards.text:
Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and enchantments.
Cycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.name: Armageddon
cards.text: Destroy all lands.

cards.flavor: "I do not miss Jukai Forest. It is not my home. My home is Kamigawa, its people my family. Wherever I set my pack and rest my head, I am home."
cards.name: Azusa, Lost but Seeking
cards.text: You may play two additional lands on each of your turns.

cards.flavor: "We earn no medals and fight for no titles. Blood is the proof of our victory." —Lovisa Coldeyes
cards.name: Balduvian Horde
cards.text: When Balduvian Horde enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard a card at random.

cards.flavor: The most frightening storms are those not woven by nature's hand."
cards.name: Ball Lightning
cards.text:
Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to defending player or planeswalker while attacking.)
Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Ball Lightning.

cards.flavor: The wills of mortals shift as the tide ebbs and flows.
cards.name: Bident of Thassa
cards.text:
Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.
{1}{U}, {T}: Creatures your opponents control attack this turn if able.

cards.name: Blood Moon
cards.text: Nonbasic lands are Mountains.

cards.name: Blue Elemental Blast
cards.text:
Choose one -
• Counter target red spell.
• Destroy target red permanent.

cards.name: Chalice of the Void
cards.text:
Chalice of the Void enters the battlefield with X charge counters on it.
Whenever a player casts a spell with converted mana cost equal to the number of charge counters on Chalice of the Void, counter that spell.

cards.flavor: "Of all the things that can be stolen, opportunity is the most valuable."
cards.name: Cursecatcher
cards.text: Sacrifice Cursecatcher: Counter target instant or sorcery spell unless its controller pays {1}.

cards.flavor: "With his dream of unification fulfilled, Darien became the last king of Kjeldor. Those who followed were known as the kings of New Argive." —Kjeldor: Ice Civilization
cards.name: Darien, King of Kjeldor
cards.text: Whenever you're dealt damage, you may create that many 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

cards.name: Dark Ritual
cards.text: Add {B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Doomsday
cards.text: Search your library and graveyard for five cards and exile the rest. Put the chosen cards on top of your library in any order. You lose half your life, rounded up.

cards.flavor: Xenagos reveled while Theros burned.
cards.name: Eidolon of the Great Revel
cards.text: Whenever a player casts a spell with converted mana cost 3 or less, Eidolon of the Great Revel deals 2 damage to that player.

cards.name: Eladamri's Call
cards.text: Search your library for a creature card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

cards.flavor: "When I said I needed a hand, I didn't mean this." —Gerrard Capashen
cards.name: Ensnaring Bridge
cards.text: Creatures with power greater than the number of cards in your hand can't attack.

cards.name: Fierce Empath
cards.text: When Fierce Empath enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a creature card with converted mana cost 6 or greater, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

cards.flavor: No tactic transforms a battle like a well-timed carnivore.
cards.name: Flash
cards.text: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. If you do, sacrifice it unless you pay its mana cost reduced by up to {2}.

cards.flavor: "Only the most effective tactics stand the test of time." —Gamelen, Citanul Elder
cards.name: Giant Growth
cards.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

cards.name: Gisela, Blade of Goldnight
cards.text:
Flying, first strike
If a source would deal damage to an opponent or a permanent an opponent controls, that source deals double that damage to that player or permanent instead.
If a source would deal damage to you or a permanent you control, prevent half that damage, rounded up.

cards.name: Goblin War Drums
cards.text: Creatures you control have menace. (They can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

cards.flavor: "I never thought I'd spend my life fighting. I'm a maker, not a destroyer."
cards.name: Hanna, Ship's Navigator
cards.text: {1}{W}{U}, {T}: Return target artifact or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.flavor: A passionate recruiter will win a war before the first arrow flies.
cards.name: Imperial Recruiter
cards.text: When Imperial Recruiter enters the battlefield, search your library for a creature card with power 2 or less, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Jace, the Mind Sculptor
cards.text:
+2: Look at the top card of target player's library. You may put that card on the bottom of that player's library.
0: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.
-1: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
-12: Exile all cards from target player's library, then that player shuffles his or her hand into his or her library.

cards.flavor: "A river of lava is just another river to cross."
cards.name: Kor Firewalker
cards.text:
Protection from red
Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may gain 1 life.

cards.name: Living Death
cards.text: Each player exiles all creature cards from his or her graveyard, then sacrifices all creatures he or she controls, then puts all cards he or she exiled this way onto the battlefield.

cards.flavor: The best wishes include the will to tame their consequences.
cards.name: Living Wish
cards.text: You may choose a creature or land card you own from outside the game, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Exile Living Wish.

cards.name: Magus of the Wheel
cards.text: {1}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Magus of the Wheel: Each player discards his or her hand, then draws seven cards.

cards.flavor: "No matter how busy my schedule gets, I always try to take time for that personal touch." — Queen Marchesa
cards.name: Murder
cards.text: Destroy target creature.

cards.name: Niv-Mizzet, the Firemind
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever you draw a card, Niv-Mizzet, the Firemind deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
{T}: Draw a card.

cards.flavor: "Behold blessed perfection." —Sheoldred, Whispering One
cards.name: Phyrexian Obliterator
cards.text:
Trample
Whenever a source deals damage to Phyrexian Obliterator, that source's controller sacrifices that many permanents.

cards.flavor: "The embers of our homes still smolder, and already the villages of Kjeldor burn in retaliation. What they have started, we will finish." — Lovisa Coldeyes
cards.name: Pillage
cards.text: Destroy target artifact or land. It can't be regenerated.

cards.name: Prossh, Skyraider of Kher
cards.text:
Flying
When you cast Prossh, Skyraider of Kher, create X 0/1 red Kobold creature tokens named Kobolds of Kher Keep, where X is the amount of mana spent to cast Prossh.
Sacrifice another creature: Prossh gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: "Meat and eggs. We eat!" —Borborygmos
cards.name: Protean Hulk
cards.text: When Protean Hulk dies, search your library for any number of creature cards with total converted mana cost 6 or less and put them onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Red Elemental Blast
cards.text:
Choose one -
• Counter target blue spell.
• Destroy target blue permanent.

cards.flavor: Rishada is the gateway to free trade—but the key will cost you.
cards.name: Rishadan Port
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{1}, {T}: Tap target land.

cards.name: Ruric Thar, the Unbowed
cards.text:
Vigilance, reach
Ruric Thar, the Unbowed attacks each combat if able.
Whenever a player casts a noncreature spell, Ruric Thar deals 6 damage to that player.

cards.flavor: "One alone is fearsome; one among many is unstoppable."—Benalish proverb
cards.name: Savannah Lions

cards.flavor: "Even if we defeat it, what remains to be saved?" —Glissa Sunseeker
cards.name: Sundering Titan
cards.text: When Sundering Titan enters the battlefield or leaves the battlefield, choose a land of each basic land type, then destroy those lands.

cards.flavor: "Thraben is our home and I will not see it fall to this unhallowed horde."
cards.name: Thalia, Guardian of Thraben
cards.text:
First strike
Noncreature spells cost {1} more to cast.

cards.flavor: The Cabal loves encores.
cards.name: Undead Gladiator
cards.text:
{1}{B}, Discard a card: Return Undead Gladiator from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.
Cycling {1}{B} ({1}{B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.name: Vendilion Clique
cards.text:
Flash
Flying
When Vendilion Clique enters the battlefield, look at target player's hand. You may choose a nonland card from it. If you do, that player reveals the chosen card, puts it on the bottom of his or her library, then draws a card.

cards.name: Vindicate
cards.text: Destroy target permanent.

cards.name: Willbender
cards.text:
Morph {1}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Willbender is turned face up, change the target of target spell or ability with a single target.

cards.flavor: "The first birth celebrates life. The second birth mocks it." —Mystic elder
cards.name: Zombify
cards.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
